Member Function Documentation

void caelum::SkyDome::preViewportUpdate (  const Ogre::RenderTargetViewportEvent &  e  ) 
 

Event trigger called just before rendering a viewport in a render target this dome is attached to. Useful to make the dome follow every camera that renders a viewport in a certain render target.

Parameters:
e The viewport event, containing the viewport (and camera) to be rendered right now.
